data.message: Dislike! I hate the new look, why are you always messing with a perfectly good thing! Why don't you find a way for us to stop getting so many Ads and "promoted" posts from companies I don't care about!

replies.message: i do not like old news,i feel like am on the right news feed!!!, Do not like.
If you don't want Ads on Facebook, be prepared to open your wallet!  Just sayin..
Everytime they 'THINK' they improve things,it proves just the opposite.I dislike with a vengeance
I agree...why are you messing with a good thing....I hate the numerous ad posts...STOP IT!!

. . . or from any companies for that matter !!! I feel like facebook is becoming a big ad billboard . . . just like everyone else. Don't you guys understand that we are overdosed with advertising and marketing plots. In fact . . . I want you to know that annoying me into buying stuff does exactly the opposite. I refuse to click on and or buy from these sources even if I'm interested in the product.
I love it, dont change it please

Especially when a lot of the ads have a virus or are spam, I act like they aren't even there! I adjusted to the new timeline but I don't see that happening with this news feed. I will be spending less time on Face Book.
IK I have bought things on fb for games but if they keep pushing it on me I won't buy anything again!!
I have spent less time on fb since the change just not as good
